trans-unit.source: Represents a claim for a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token that asserts that an authorization decision regarding access by the subject to the specified resource has been made.
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify whether a subject is authorized to access a specific resource.
The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements.
The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.
An SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement asserts an authorization decision regarding access by the subject to the specified resource has been made.
The following table summarizes the properties that are associated with the authorization decision.

|Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A>|The authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority with respect to the resource represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A> property.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence%2A>|A set of SAML assertions that the SAML authority relied on to render the decision.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A>|A URI reference that identifies the resource to which access is sought.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions%2A>|The set of actions that the subject is authorized to perform on the resource represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A> property.|
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement"></xref> class.

This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `false` and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A> property to `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement"></xref> class.
using the specified subject, resource, authorization decision, and the actions sought by the subject on the resource.

This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `false`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A> property to `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`, and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence%2A> property to `null`.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject"></xref> that represents the subject of the claim.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.SamlSubject*> property.
A URI reference that identifies the resource to which access is sought.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource*> property.

A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision"></xref> that specifies the authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority with respect to access by the subject to the specified resource.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision*> property.

An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"></xref> that specifies the set of actions that the subject is authorized to perform on the resource.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions*> property.
samlActions is .
-or- samlActions contains a member that is .
-or- samlSubject is .
authorityBindings contains a member that is .
-or- resource is or empty.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement"></xref> class.
using the specified subject, resource, authorization decision, and the actions sought by the subject on the resource.

This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `false`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A> property to `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject"></xref> that represents the subject of the claim.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.SamlSubject*> property.
A URI reference that identifies the resource to which access is sought.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource*> property.

A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision"></xref> that specifies the authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority with respect to access by the subject to the specified resource.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision*> property.

An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"></xref> that specifies the set of actions that the subject is authorized to perform on the resource.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions*> property.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence"></xref> that contains a set of SAML assertions that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence*> property.
Gets or sets the authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority with respect to access by the subject to the specified resource.

The AccessDecision property corresponds to the `Decision` attribute of the `<AuthorizationDecisionStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.

One of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision"></xref> values that specify the authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority with respect to access by the subject to the specified resource.
Exception type
Condition
<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>
The AccessDecision property is set and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Adds claims based on the properties of this instance to the specified collection of claims.
The AddClaimsToList method adds a claim to the `claims` parameter for each action specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions%2A> property.

Each claim that is added to the collection is based on the action, and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> properties.
The claim resource type is <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionClaimResource>.
An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> that contains the set of claims to add to.
claims is .
Gets the type of security claim.
The type of security claim.
Always `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`.
Gets or sets the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> property corresponds to the `<Evidence>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence"></xref> that contains a set of SAML assertions that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
Gets a value that indicates whether the properties of this instance are read-only.

To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Causes this instance to be read-only.

When the MakeReadOnly method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.
Reads the SAML authorization statement from the specified XML reader.

The ReadXml method sets the following properties: - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence%2A> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions%2A>
A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the SAML authorization statement.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML authorization statement that is defined in the SAML specification.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
reader is .
-or- samlSerializer is .
reader refers to an XML element that does not contain the and attributes.
-or- reader refers to an XML element that does not have , , and child elements.
The resource to which access is sought by the subject of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> property corresponds to the `Decision` attribute of the `<AuthorizationDecisionStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
A URI reference that identifies the resource to which access is sought.
Gets the set of actions that the subject is authorized to perform on the resource.
The SamlActions property corresponds to the `<Action>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.

An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"></xref> that specifies the set of actions that the subject is authorized to perform on the resource.
Writes the SAML authorization statement into the specified XML serializer.
Use the WriteXml method to write the current <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> instance into a `<AuthorizationDecisionStatement>` element.
A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> to write the SAML authorization statement.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing XML elements in a SAML assertion.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clauses.
writer is .
-or- samlSerializer is .
